name: Belcanto
description: Belcanto is a Michelin-starred restaurant in Lisbon, known for its innovative Portuguese cuisine.

name: Alma
description: Alma offers a contemporary dining experience in Lisbon, combining traditional Portuguese flavors with modern techniques.

name: Feitoria
description: Feitoria is a renowned restaurant located in the Altis Belém Hotel, offering stunning views and a menu inspired by Portuguese history and gastronomy.

name: Eleven
description: Eleven is a sophisticated restaurant situated on the top floor of a building in Eduardo VII Park, offering panoramic views of the city and a gourmet menu.

name: Bairro do Avillez
description: Bairro do Avillez is a culinary hub created by renowned Portuguese chef José Avillez, featuring different dining concepts and flavors.

name: Cantina do Avillez
description: Cantina do Avillez is a casual eatery by chef José Avillez, serving traditional Portuguese dishes with a modern twist.

name: Mini Bar
description: Mini Bar is a unique gastronomic experience by chef José Avillez, offering a playful menu of small plates and creative cocktails.

name: Loco
description: Loco is a Michelin-starred restaurant in Lisbon, known for its avant-garde cuisine and focus on seasonal and locally sourced ingredients.

name: Cervejaria Ramiro
description: Cervejaria Ramiro is a famous seafood restaurant in Lisbon, serving a wide variety of fresh seafood dishes in a lively atmosphere.

name: A Cevicheria
description: A Cevicheria is a popular restaurant specializing in ceviche, offering a creative menu inspired by Peruvian flavors.

name: Taberna da Rua das Flores
description: Taberna da Rua das Flores is a cozy and traditional tavern in Lisbon, serving delicious Portuguese dishes and wines.

name: Porto Final
description: Porto Final is a riverside restaurant offering stunning views of the Tagus River and a menu featuring fresh seafood and Portuguese cuisine.

name: Solar dos Presuntos
description: Solar dos Presuntos is a long-standing restaurant in Lisbon, renowned for its traditional Portuguese dishes and warm atmosphere.
